content: Hi, Is it possible to create select buttons? or something like objective-type Questions and get-back users selection? in a message?

@Mahaveer Jain Not yet. Right now the most closely related thing to select buttons is that users can interact with messages by using "emoji reactions." We want to add more interactive features.

Here's how a typical emoji poll works...
One idea we've had is to build on the emoji reaction concept by allowing users to make their own text reactions that are small snippets of text.
I don't think it text reactions make sense. An actual poll though, sure.

@Steve Howell @Boris Yankov

Kindly point me to the code which handles select buttons using "emoji reactions". (Im Not able to find myself :()
much appreciated. :) thanks.

Any idea... if Is it technically feasible? Any known limitations?

@Mahaveer Jain Most of the JS-side code for displaying emoji reactions is in static/js/reactions.js. When a user clicks on a reaction, an endpoint called /json/messages/<message id>/reactions gets called, and that eventually populates a DB table called zerver_reaction.
